member.name: GROUP_RELATIONSHIP
member.summary: Represents information about processor groups. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: GROUP_RELATIONSHIP.MaximumGroupCount
member.summary: The maximum number of processor groups on the system.

member.name: GROUP_RELATIONSHIP.ActiveGroupCount
member.summary: The number of active groups on the system. This member indicates the number of structures in the GroupInfo array.

member.name: GROUP_RELATIONSHIP.GroupInfo
member.summary: An array of structures. Each structure represents the number and affinity of processors in an active group on the system.
